response.overview: Evgeniya lives in Moscow. She is already under 40 years old. Behind life and divorce from an unloved husband. The daughter is an adult, she has been studying in America for a long time. One day, Zhenya meets Gosha - a responsible person, difficult to make decisions, sincere, but inert. Zhenya's life was not at all joyful and bright. After all, this is an affair with a married man.  She turns for help and advice to her friends who are happy to teach her how to live, then to the church, then to a fortuneteller, then to professional psychotherapists. The meeting with the psychologist Sveta helped the woman endure this difficult romance and win Goshino's heart.
response.tagline: How to get a happy ending
response.title: Miracles Don't Happen
